title: ISO100 Logotype
content:
Not so personal but hope that it's easy to remember. Logo is for my photography trade name website/portfolio. Need it add something?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131026123605im_/http:/typophile.com/files/iso100_3550.png)
author: jalmari

comments.content:
James E. Richards  
Excellent. A+ for legibility.

Great! Simple and efficient! Nice choice! Like it but I would kern a bit... The kerning seems to be different for ISO and 100. I would personnaly try those:

1. less space between the "zeros"

2. more space between ISO and 100

3. all the same space-kerning everywhere

-----------------:  
Jean Chouinard
